member.name: F:Uno.Xaml.ParsedMarkupExtensionInfo.BindingMembersRegex
member.summary: This regex returns the members of a binding expression which are separated by commas but keeps the commas inside the member value. e.g. [Property], ConverterParameter='A', TargetNullValue='B', FallbackValue='C,D,E,F' returns - [Property] - ConverterParameter='A' - TargetNullValue='B' - FallbackValue='C,D,E,F'
